pr_title: Add Package Level Javadoc for Snapshot Clones

timeline.message:
Add Package Level Javadoc for Snapshot Clones

Adds package level JavaDoc for snapshot clones.
Relates #61839

timeline.bodyText: Just a thought I had while writing this up. The placeholder logic might be questionable but we can easily remove it in a BwC manner like we did for snapshot create if want to in a follow-up so I'm not too worried here either.
timeline.author: original-brownbear
